name: 2auth.org
body:
## What is it?

It's a free service which provides [Two-Factor authentication](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two-factor_authentication) for the masses. It supports many mechanism to validate the user's authenticity at login time.

### Clients

1. Telegram
2. E-mail.

### Pricing

The service is free and unlimited for both, the clients and the service providers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
